channel.title: Generative AI on DillonBaird.io
channel.description: Recent content in Generative AI on DillonBaird.io

item.title: Embracing the Illusion: Our Desire to Humanize AI, and Its Consequences
item.description: As I explore the world of AI, I sometimes find myself in a role I didn’t expect: part-digital therapist, part-coach. It was surprising to see how these AI systems at first seemed to react to encouragement or feedback, similar to coaching a talented athlete. This experience was more than just learning about what AI can do. It was a window into our innate desire as social beings to connect with and humanize our technological creations, no matter how sophisticated their underlying code may be.

item.title: The 2024 Tech Forecast: Pioneering Tech Redefining Our World
item.description: I’m diving into 2024 with eyes wide open for the tech that’s got me buzzing. This isn’t just any tech roundup; it’s a personal tour through the innovations that I’m stoked about â€“ the stuff that’s pushing boundaries and shaping what’s next. Whether it’s the latest in AI, the next leap in space tech, or health innovations that are changing the game, I’m here to share my take on what these advancements mean for us and the world.
